ai-atk-abh02a10:9_1: Right speech is twofold, I say:
ai-atk-abh02a10:9_2: There is right speech that is accompanied by defilements, has the attributes of good deeds, and ripens in attachment.
ai-atk-abh02a10:9_3: And there is right speech that is noble.
ai-atk-abh02a10:10_0: “And what is right speech that is accompanied by defilements, has the attributes of good deeds, and ripens in attachment?
ai-atk-abh02a10:10_1: The refraining from lying, divisive speech, harsh speech, and talking nonsense.
ai-atk-abh02a10:10_2: This is right speech that is accompanied by defilements.
ai-atk-abh02a10:11_0: “And what is right speech that is noble, undefiled, transcendent, a factor of the path?

ai-atk-abh02a10:12_1: Right action is twofold, I say.
